commit message:
ResolverActivity from Lollipop source code is added
And modified to use RecyclerView.

Schematic library is added.
Database with Provider is added.
Preferred Activity feature is also done.

Timber added.
Crashlytics enabled through App class.
Logs are converted to Timber logs.

Initial preferred Activity is finished.
It just shows the preferred activities in a list. Will do more in the near future.

Dividers added to the list.
Items made bigger.
Design library and collapsing header is added.

Confirmation dialog is added to remove the apps.
CursorLoader should be used to display the data. The data is not updated upon deletion.

Caller Package is used instead of the ComponentName. It's because caller and the share Activities inside a same app are not the same.
If caller Activity is preferred, don't open the caller again, just ask show the other apps.
Get the caller package from the system for before Lollipop devices.

Get the caller package from the system using UsageStatsManager for devices above API 22.
API level 20 and 21 devices are left out.
Screenshots are added to art folder.
